title: ImThour
author: ImThour
content: Hi,If anyone wants to get anything done automated with Python or you want any webscraper to be built, no matter which website, let me know.I have quite expertise in NodeJS/JavaScript and Python and will be able to complete tasks at a reasonable price.My Previous Work:- Web Scrapped Twitter in 2023 (If you know how hard it is now, then you might appreciate it)- Web Scrapped BUFF163, a CS:GO marketplace. It doesn't have any API.- Automated various tasks for employees in Multi National Companies like Dell, IBM, Cognizant etc.Services:- Automate any task- Webscrape any website- Create Chrome ExtensionsYou can contact me in DM if you are interested. Cheers!

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Hi, bumping. Still providing my services. You can DM me to know more.
